38 #pragma once
39 
40 #include <moveit_simple_controller_manager/action_based_controller_handle.h>
41 #include <control_msgs/FollowJointTrajectoryAction.h>
42 
43 namespace moveit_simple_controller_manager
44 {
45 /*
46  * This is generally used for arms, but could also be used for multi-dof hands,
47  * or anything using a control_mgs/FollowJointTrajectoryAction.
48  */
49 class FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle
50  : public ActionBasedControllerHandle<control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryAction>
51 {
52 public:
53  FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle(const std::string& name, const std::string& action_ns)
54  : ActionBasedControllerHandle<control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryAction>(name, action_ns)
55  {
56  }
57 
58  bool sendTrajectory(const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory) override;
59 
60  void configure(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue& config) override;
61 
62 protected:
63  void configure(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue& config, const std::string& config_name,
64  std::vector<control_msgs::JointTolerance>& tolerances);
65  static control_msgs::JointTolerance& getTolerance(std::vector<control_msgs::JointTolerance>& tolerances,
66  const std::string& name);
67 
68  void controllerDoneCallback(const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState& state,
69  const control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResultConstPtr& result);
70 
71  void controllerActiveCallback();
72 
73  void controllerFeedbackCallback(const control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryFeedbackConstPtr& feedback);
74 
75  control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryGoal goal_template_;
76 };
77 
78 } // end namespace moveit_simple_controller_manager
